title: Mazhaikulle Lyrics Puriyatha Puthir
stanzas:
Mazhaikulle nanaiyum
oru kaatrai pola allavaa
manam

unai paarkkum podhu
enthan vaarthai oomai
enavae maarum.

nee en uyirilaagum
oru pudhiya thaagam
thaanadaa

yaen yaen siragu
neelgirathu
parakka thonugirathe
yaenadaa

poonkaatril adi
un vaasam adhai
thaedi thaedi
tholainthen.

nee meendu vara
naan thaanadi en
vazhvin vazhvai koduthen

yaaro ivan yaaro
theeraa neram venum
ivanodu serndhida

yaaro ivan yaaro
kaanaa thooram
pogum ivan
kaigal korthida

yaeno yaeno nenjil
pookkal pookindratho
moongil kaatil oru
raagam kaetkindratho (2)

nee yaen karai puranda
oru aatrai pola
ennil sergiraai

theeyil karugi pogum
oru panjin nilaiyil
enai aakkinaai.

kanne unnai kandaale
munne nenjil kaayangal
penne valikkuthe. (2)

neeyum ini naanum
naamaai sera kodi
inbangal koodanum

thaedum karai thaedum
alai pol inbam endrum
nam vazhvai thaedanum

yaeno yaeno kangal
unnai paarkindratho
mogatheeyil modhi
kadhal serkindratho(2)

kanne unnai kandaale
munne nenjil kaayangal
penne valikkuthe. (2)
